appDescription.message: Shows a 3D space live wallpaper with a search bar that uses your default search engine.

welcomeDescription.message: Thank you for installing the extension! Follow these simple steps below to start enjoying your new tab experience:

step1Text.message: Press Ctrl + T (or Cmd + T on Mac) to open a new browser tab. You'll see a popup with the 3D Space Wallpaper.

step1Note1.message: Chrome might ask: "Change back to Google?". This happens when an extension updates the new tab page.

step1Note2.message: to continue using the 3D Space Wallpaper extension.

step2Text.message: Right-click on the footer at the bottom of the new tab page.

step2Note2.message: Click “Hide footer on New Tab page”.

step2End.message: This will remove the footer and give you a cleaner view.

enjoyText.message: Enjoy the stars every time you open a tab. More customization features are coming soon!
